# Ministry of Culture (Moldova)

(as Ministry of Culture and Cults)
| preceding1      = Ministry of Education, Culture and Research
| preceding2      = Ministry of Culture and Tourism
| preceding3      = Ministry of Culture and Cults
| jurisdiction    = Government of Moldova
| headquarters    = 24 Nicolae Iorga Street, Chișinău
| minister1_name  = Cristian Jardan
| minister1_pfo   = Minister of Culture
| chief1_name     = Ana Varzari
| chief1_position = Secretary General
| chief2_name     = Vladimir Vornic

The Ministry of Culture () is one of the fourteen ministries of the Government of Moldova. The current minister is Sergiu Prodan. He has raised complaints due to the neglectance of culture in the Moldovan Government and the low salaries that the workers of the Ministry of Culture receive, specifying that in 2022 they would increase.
